name: Pizza Cupcakes from Scratch
author: Rebekah Rose Hills
summary: Family friendly pizza cupcakes! They are biscuit-like in texture, and you can mix and match the filling ingredients. Serve warm with some pizza sauce to dip in!
ingredients: ½ cup pizza sauce, for dipping
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray 9 wells in a cupcake tin with nonstick cooking spray, or line with paper liners (spray the liners with nonstick cooking spray)
Combine flour, sugar, salt, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and baking powder in a bowl
Whisk to combine and make a well in the center
Add milk, oil, and egg to the well and whisk them gently together to blend before using a fork or spatula to incorporate the wet ingredients into the dry
Stir mozzarella cheese and pepperoni into the sticky batter
Divide batter amongst the prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until cupcakes are lightly browned and baked through, 13 to 15 minutes
Cool in the pan for 1 to 2 minutes, then move to a cooling rack
Serve warm with pizza sauce for dipping if desired
